step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with closed fists and arms drawn in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Good form on this step. Ensure you are fully opening your fingers and extending arms to shoulder height while exhaling.
You're maintaining good control. Focus on keeping your arms at shoulder height and continuing the exhale.
Excellent completion of the first repetition! You're doing well with the arm movements and muscle engagement.
Good start to your second rep. Remember to inhale and really tighten those muscles as you bring your arms in.
Well done opening your hands and extending. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles throughout this movement.
Your form is looking good. Make sure your arms are reaching shoulder height and you're exhaling fully.
You're keeping a steady pace. Focus on maintaining the arm extension and continuing the exhale.
Fantastic job completing both repetitions! You've shown great control and consistency throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles when bringing your arms in, then exhale and relax as you open your hands and extend your arms. Keep up the excellent work!
